title: Movistar plans for post-Annemiek van Vleuten life by signing 17-year-old rising star
content:
Cat Ferguson will join the team as a stagiaire in 2024 before stepping up to the WorldTour full-time in 2025.

Read the full article at Movistar plans for post-Annemiek van Vleuten life by signing 17-year-old rising star on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
